list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Add Catalog, Search, and Rank classes, and extend Book
Introduced new `Catalog`, `Search`, and `Rank` classes to handle library cataloging, searching, and ranking functionalities. Enhanced `Book` and `BookItem` classes with constructors and additional fields to support these new features. Updated `Author` and `Librarian` to include books and membership control functionality respectively.

task.summary:
Refactor enum classes and convert Person and Address to records
Replaced enums with more descriptive values for BookStatus, AccountStatus, and added a new RevervationStatus enum. Converted Person and Address classes to records for better immutable data representation. Removed the unused resetPassword method from Account class.

Enhance Account and Member classes with constructors and setters
Updated the `Account` class to include constructors, getters, and setters. Improved the `Member` class by extending `Account` and adding initialization in the constructor. Additionally, updated `AccountStatus` enum to use camelCase for consistency.

Delete compiled classes and FXML resources
Removed all compiled class files, FXML files, and image assets from the target directory to clean up the project. These generated files are unnecessary for version control and can be rebuilt.

Add Catalog, Search, and Rank classes, and extend Book
Introduced new `Catalog`, `Search`, and `Rank` classes to handle library cataloging, searching, and ranking functionalities. Enhanced `Book` and `BookItem` classes with constructors and additional fields to support these new features. Updated `Author` and `Librarian` to include books and membership control functionality respectively.

MESSAGE.value:
Refactor enum classes and convert Person and Address to records
Replaced enums with more descriptive values for BookStatus, AccountStatus, and added a new RevervationStatus enum. Converted Person and Address classes to records for better immutable data representation. Removed the unused resetPassword method from Account class.

Enhance Account and Member classes with constructors and setters
Updated the `Account` class to include constructors, getters, and setters. Improved the `Member` class by extending `Account` and adding initialization in the constructor. Additionally, updated `AccountStatus` enum to use camelCase for consistency.

Delete compiled classes and FXML resources
Removed all compiled class files, FXML files, and image assets from the target directory to clean up the project. These generated files are unnecessary for version control and can be rebuilt.

Add Catalog, Search, and Rank classes, and extend Book
Introduced new `Catalog`, `Search`, and `Rank` classes to handle library cataloging, searching, and ranking functionalities. Enhanced `Book` and `BookItem` classes with constructors and additional fields to support these new features. Updated `Author` and `Librarian` to include books and membership control functionality respectively.
